executive_summary: A 5.5-hour technical session (June 2025) debugging RDFLib/SPARQL errors in a knowledge garden batch extractor. Working with Fuseki triplestore, SPARQL endpoints, and knowledge graph data structures. File mentions: 'knowledge_garden_batch_extractor.py', URIs like 'urn:knowledgegarden:default'. This is INFRASTRUCTURE for knowledge organization - likely supporting Friend Reflection Tool or Insight Journalism concepts.

analyst_notes.significance: CRITICAL: This reveals Knowledge Garden - a semantic web infrastructure project that implements the 'knowledge organization' value seen across multiple conversations. This is the TECHNICAL IMPLEMENTATION of Insight Journalism concept and supports Friend Reflection Tool. Using RDF/SPARQL shows sophisticated approach to structured knowledge.
analyst_notes.pattern_recognition: IAP (debugging) serving CAP (knowledge organization). The infrastructure enables values work: Friend Reflection Tool (#13), Insight Journalism (#6), values discovery (#11). This is how Bilal implements 'knowledge organization' - through semantic web technology.
analyst_notes.knowledge_organization_implementation: While Insight Journalism (#6) is the product concept and Friend Reflection Tool (#13) is the values interface, Knowledge Garden is the INFRASTRUCTURE - the semantic web backbone. This is advanced technical architecture for meaning-making tools.
